forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny, with a high near 41. West wind 6 to 12 mph, with gusts as high as 22 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 27. Southwest wind 1 to 5 mph.

weather_report:
This morning in Boston, the sky opens wide in a serene embrace of sunshine, promising a day painted in muted hues of winter light. As you step outside, the air bites at your skin, sharp and invigorating, yet it carries with it a sense of clarity that invigorates the spirit. A gentle west wind whispers through the streets, beckoning you to enjoy the lingering warmth of the sun as it glides toward its zenith, where it will crest around forty-one degrees. The atmosphere feels clean, like a breath of fresh possibilities, encouraging one to partake in the simple joys of the day. 

As the sun will yield to a more subdued evening, where the temperature dips toward a chill that hovers around twenty-seven degrees, there’s a subtle invitation to layer up; a light jacket or a cozy sweater would suffice as twilight settles in. This evening, perhaps consider a stroll along the Charles River, where the soft murmur of water accompanied by the cooling breeze creates a tapestry of tranquility. In this mild winter sun, it is the perfect time to prepare a warm cup of tea and gather with friends indoors, sharing stories as the day gently unfurls into the comforting embrace of night.
